UBDY5mjtuNE.Title: Scrape YouTube Search Results Using Python || Python Tutorial
UBDY5mjtuNE.Author: DannyDoo
UBDY5mjtuNE.Description:
0:00 Demonstration
0:49 Requirements
1:08 Creating A Response Object
2:35 Creating Soup Object
3:05 Scraping The Search Results
6:38 Extracting The JSON String
10:45 Extracting Search Details
12:32 Parsing The Data
15:55 Search By User Input

Previous Tutorial : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k16zhsMI9dM

====== StackOverflow Answer ======
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/47515137/extracting-data-from-javascript-var-inside-script-with-python

====== Requirements For The Code To Run ======
BeautifulSoup : pip install bs4

Requests : pip install requests

(optional) LXML Parser : pip install lxml

====== Thumbnail Attribution =====
 Image by jplenio - https://pixabay.com/images/id-3622519/

pAnld0aOxfQ.Title: Plato, le robot français qui va vous servir au restaurant
pAnld0aOxfQ.Author: Le Parisien
pAnld0aOxfQ.Description: Plato est un robot "passe plat", conçu en France pour accompagner les serveurs dans leurs service.
